title: Barry Manilow: I Jump At The Chance To Do A Christmas Album
teaser: David Greene talks to Barry Manilow about his favorite Christmas music. In 2012, he released a compilation of his 3 Christmas albums. (This piece initially aired on Dec. 17, 2012 on Morning Edition).
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
